translations: 非原先的，非独创的；模仿的

sentences.sentence: That will only stifle your creativity and could make your writing seem dry and unoriginal.
sentences.translation: 这只会抑制你的创造力，可能让你的作品看上去干瘪，没有原创色彩。

sentences.sentence: He called the new building unoriginal and said that it merely aped the classical traditions.
sentences.translation: 他说这幢新建筑缺乏新意，只是仿效古典传统而已。

sentences.sentence: I've read a lot of advice telling me not to bore people with cliched, unoriginal conversation topics.
sentences.translation: 我曾经读过很多建议，它们告诉我，不要拿味如鸡肋，陈词滥调的话题来让人觉得无聊。
